Venere room description: The room is comfortably and welcomingly furnished with a double bed, a wardrobe, a desk, and a chair. It has a private bathroom with a shower and is equipped with air conditioning and heating to ensure maximum comfort in any season.
Diana room description: Furnished in a simple yet elegant style, the room has a double and a single bed, wardrobe, and desk. The bathroom is private and includes a bathtub and shower.
Well connected description: Centrally located to reach any destination in the city and surrounding urban centers. Served by public transport.
Wifi description: Wifi 6 available for free throughout the property.
Air conditioning description: Air conditioning present in all rooms.
Electronic entrance description: No keys! You will be provided with a code to access the property.
